page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT IN SOUTH CROXTON
page.content:
They sell their cattle to Melton market and their corn to corn merchants which they collect from the farm.They buy their machinery from various places,it depends on the service these places offer if machinery breaks down.They mostly grow barley & corn.
Another farm in South Croxton is Grange farm owned by the Spokes. Mr & Mrs Spokes have cattle & sheep but no dairy cattle.They have 400 acres of farmland.Their main crop is { corn.Since Mrs Spokes has lived on the farm,lots of other farms have been sold.
